TopicTitle: how do i make a ksp mod?

Articles.Content: Im trying to make a mod where you can go to a planet in the tracking station to build a base or something, without having the hassle to fly to the mun (or other planets)  does any one know what i could use to make this mod.

So, you're talking about having a craft and then magically transporting it to one of the other bodies in the system?  The debug cheat menu can get you into orbit and then Hyperedit can put you on the planet.  No flying (or mod making) involved.
Try this post for starters:

thank you both, but how do i install hyper edit? and how do i use the debug cheat menu? i know how to get the mods to kerbal, but what website should i use to install hyper edit.

18 minutes ago, jon greengirg said:

thank you both, but how do i install hyper edit? and how do i use the debug cheat menu? i know how to get the mods to kerbal, but what website should i use to install hyper edit.

 

if you install CKAN, then the program will do all installation for you for any mods + CKAN will tell you when updates are available. If you decide to install hyperedit manually, you will have to download the file, and them move it to your game data folder (found under the main KSP folder on PC, exact location depends on what device/version your using of KSP). to open the debug menu on the PC edition, its alt+f12.
